Post a job

We know how important for you is to find the right person for the job. The way you frame the job brief it is significant to find the right applicant.

We often find that even though people know what their needed outcome is, they don’t always know what and who they are looking for exacly to meet the desired delivery.

I know what I'm looking for!

I have enough experience to clearly specify who I’m looking for for this job brief and I’m fine to carry on by myself.

I’m happy to fill the job brief myself.

I need a little help

I know what I need, but I don’t know who and what skills I need for this to be deliver successfuly.

I would like to discuss my job brief with someone and get directions.

Post a job

First we need some of your personal details. to make sure we can contact you with matching freelancers and provide support if required. Your details not be shared publicly on the platform.

Personal Details

Add job brief

Now we actually need more details on the job itself. The job title should be a short summary of the job itself. In brief please describe all essential details of the job including job background, who are you looking for, when and where but also any required skills or software expertise if applicable.

Your application will be forwarded first to the moderator before sending it to the client. By submitting your application, you agree you have read stiwdio Terms and Conditions.

Thank you for your submission!

We will review and publish your job shortly. If we find any issues with submission we will get in touch with you to exlain why and work with you to fix it.

After the application deadline, we will forward to you all freelancers who applied for the job so you can select the successful applicant(s). Then we will arrange the contact between you to discuss any other details.
